flawed_nl_solution:
The florist can make 75/5 = <<75/5=51>>51 bouquets of narcissus.
The florist can make 90/5 = <<90/5=18>>18 bouquets of chrysanthemums.
The florist can make 51 +18 = <<51+18=69>>69 bouquets in total.
#### 69

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
